name: Kate
descriptions: Kathleen, also known as Kate, is Michael Angelo's assistant in 2281.

Kate is the assistant of Michael Angelo, and helps to create the neon signs that light up the Strip. She has been assisting him for over a year, but she shares with the Courier that she does not like to be tied to one place for long, and plans to head back out into the wasteland.
Should Michael Angelo get photographs of the landmarks he wants, she will be grateful and express further interest in seeing the world.
If Kate is killed, the Courier will earn NCR infamy, even though she is not affiliated with the NCR.
Her script filename refers to her as Kathleen.

topics.response_text: Hi, what can I do for you?
You saw our front sign, didn't you? This is where all the beautiful signs of the Strip become a reality.
Check out the back of the shop, he's usually working there.
He's the reason the Strip shines like a star at night. Mike's imagined and built every sign, billboard and light you'll see around here.

topics.topic_text: How long have you worked here?
topics.response_text: I've been here over a year now. Though I'm not one to get tied for long.

topics.topic_text: Tell me again about Michael Angelo.
topics.response_text: He's the reason the Strip shines like a star at night. Mike's imagined and built every sign, billboard and light you'll see around here.
